recipe.title: Baked Fish Sticks Diablo
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds catfish or other white fish fillets, cut into 3- by 3/4-inch strips
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F. Whisk first 4 ingredients in pie dish. Mix breadcrumbs with cayenne in another shallow dish. Heat 2 baking sheets in oven until hot, about 5 minutes. Brush with oil. Dip fish, 1 strip at a time, in butter mixture, then in crumbs. Turn to coat. Place 1 inch apart on prepared sheets. Bake until crumbs are golden and fish is opaque in center, about 6 minutes per side. Garnish with lemon wedges; serve.
Preheat oven to 475°F. Whisk first 4 ingredients in pie dish. Mix breadcrumbs with cayenne in another shallow dish.
Heat 2 baking sheets in oven until hot, about 5 minutes. Brush with oil.

Dip fish, 1 strip at a time, in butter mixture, then in crumbs. Turn to coat. Place 1 inch apart on prepared sheets. Bake until crumbs are golden and fish is opaque in center, about 6 minutes per side. Garnish with lemon wedges; serve.
